desc: It's Nola is your 21st century granola: compact bites, real ingredients: seeds, nuts, and dried fruit, bold one-of-a-kind flavors, and best of all, each serving is low in calories, fat, sugar, sodium and carbohydrates, a snack in a resealable on-the-go package. Children and Mom approved. Made in Brooklyn, NY.

layout.text: Looking for a snack with an exotic flavor to tickle your tastebuds? Try our bestseller.
